name: Toy Factory (Fusion2k)
description:
My entry to the 2022 X-Mas-stress-jam... Also my first completed Godot project.

Save Christmas by helping Santa make gifts for children!  He needs good gifts and not more misfit toys so be careful!  

Had a ton of fun and made something unique (hopefully).  

Made my own sprites for the toys but used some free art too:

  • Tile art and Player/Santa Sprite - franuka.itch.io
  • SFX - SubspaceAudio 
  • BG Music - Dizzy Crow
